note: Interdisciplinary philosopher (PhD University of California, Santa Cruz). Lecturer @ UCC@mastodon.ie. Affiliated Researcher @ Posthumanities Hub & Eco- and Bioart Lab @ Linköping University. Political & environmental philosophy - questions of identity, difference & violence and the (post-)Anthropocene / critical theory / queer theory / new materialist, posthumanist & Deleuzoguattarian approaches / critical pedagogies.  Meme, kitten & neurospicy queen.
